ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectOrder Declining to Set Aside or Refer Back to the CRTC Broadcasting Decision CRTC 2019-172
PrecisOrder declining to set aside or refer back to the Commission for reconsideration and hearing the decision contained in Broadcasting Decision CRTC 2019-172 of May 23, 2019 to issue a broadcasting licence to ROGERS MEDIA INC. to operate a national, multilingual multi-ethnic discretionary service known as OMNI Regional.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2019-0091 Publication Date: 2019-09-04
AttachmentsAttachment
